movies.title: Ben 10: Secret of the Omnitrix
movies.description: Ben must find the creator of the Omnitrix to stop a self-destruct sequence.

movies.title: Ben 10: Race Against Time
movies.description: Ben returns to his hometown and is hunted by Eon, an alien from another dimension.

movies.title: Ben 10: Alien Swarm
movies.description: Ben and his team must stop a global threat involving nano-sized alien chips.
